HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: How It Works?
HOW_IT_WORKS.REQUEST_DESC: Submit a purchase request with product details, including URL, size, color, and quantity.
HOW_IT_WORKS.QUOTE_DESC: We provide a detailed quote including product cost, shipping, and our service fee.
HOW_IT_WORKS.PURCHASE_DESC: After your payment, we purchase the product and have it shipped to our warehouse.
HOW_IT_WORKS.DELIVERY_DESC: We inspect the product, repackage if needed, and ship it to your address in Myanmar.

BENEFITS.CONSOLIDATION_DESC: Combine multiple purchases into one shipment to save on shipping costs.

CHOOSE.TITLE: Why Choose Our Consulting Services
CHOOSE.INTRO: What sets our consulting services apart from the rest
CHOOSE.EXPERT_DESC: Our team consists of industry veterans with extensive experience in international business, logistics, and market development across Asia and beyond.
CHOOSE.TAILORED_DESC: We don't believe in one-size-fits-all approaches. Every solution is customized to address your specific business challenges and objectives.
CHOOSE.RESULT_DESC: Our success is measured by your success. We focus on delivering tangible results that drive growth and improve your bottom line.
CHOOSE.TIMELY_DESC: We understand the importance of time in business. Our consulting projects are delivered on schedule without compromising on quality.
CHOOSE.APPROACH_DESC: We take a holistic view of your business, considering all aspects from operations to strategy, ensuring that our solutions address both immediate needs and long-term goals. Our team works closely with you at every step, providing clear communication and transparency throughout the consulting process.

PROCESS.TITLE: Our Consulting Process
PROCESS.INTRO: A structured approach to delivering exceptional consulting services
PROCESS.DISCOVERY_DESC: We begin by understanding your business, challenges, and objectives through in-depth discussions and data analysis. This phase establishes the foundation for our consulting engagement.
PROCESS.STRATEGY_DESC: Based on our assessment, we develop a tailored strategy and action plan to address your specific needs. This includes clear objectives, timelines, and key performance indicators.
PROCESS.SUPPORT_DESC: We don't just provide recommendations; we work alongside your team to implement solutions, providing guidance, training, and support throughout the process.
PROCESS.MONITOR_DESC: We continuously monitor progress, measure results against KPIs, and make necessary adjustments to ensure optimal outcomes and sustainable success.

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.INTRO: Find answers to common questions about our services.
FAQ.QUEST_1: How does Myanmar Express Hub work?
FAQ.ANS_1: Myanmar Express Hub provides international shopping and shipping services. We offer three main services: Buy For Me (we purchase products on your behalf), Buy From Other (we help you purchase from third-party sellers), and Ship for me (we provide international shipping for your packages). You can register on our platform, submit requests, and we'll handle the rest.
FAQ.QUEST_2: What countries do you ship from?
FAQ.ANS_2: We currently provide shipping services from the United States, United Kingdom, Japan, Thailand, Singapore, South Korea, Australia, and Germany. We're continuously expanding our network to include more countries.
FAQ.ANS_3: Shipping costs vary based on the weight, dimensions, and origin country of your package. We offer competitive rates starting from $8 for small packages from Thailand to Myanmar. You can find our estimated shipping rates on our Ship for me service page or contact us for a specific quote.
FAQ.ANS_4: Shipping times vary depending on the origin country and shipping method. Typically, packages from Thailand take 3-5 business days, from Japan and Singapore 5-7 business days, and from the US, UK, and Europe 7-14 business days. These are estimates and actual delivery times may vary.
FAQ.QUEST_5: What is the Buy For Me service?
FAQ.ANS_5: Our Buy For Me service allows you to purchase products from international retailers that don't ship to Myanmar. You submit a request with the product details, we provide a quote, and after your payment, we purchase the product and ship it to your address in Myanmar. This service includes product verification and customs clearance.
FAQ.QUEST_6: What is the Ship For Me service?
FAQ.ANS_6: Our Ship For Me service helps you purchase products from third-party sellers and international marketplaces. We verify the seller's reputation and product authenticity before proceeding with the purchase. This service is ideal for shopping on platforms like Amazon, eBay, Alibaba, Taobao, and other marketplaces.
FAQ.QUEST_7: How do I track my package?
FAQ.ANS_7: Once your package is shipped, you'll receive a tracking number and link to track your package in real-time. You can also log in to your account on our platform to view the status and location of your package throughout the shipping process.
FAQ.QUEST_8: What if my package is lost or damaged?
FAQ.ANS_8: All packages shipped through Myanmar Express Hub are insured against loss or damage during transit. If your package is lost or damaged, please contact our customer service team immediately. We'll file a claim and work to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
FAQ.QUEST_9: How do I pay for your services?
FAQ.ANS_9: We accept various payment methods including bank transfers, mobile banking, and international payment platforms. The available payment options will be displayed during the checkout process. All payments are secure and protected.
FAQ.ANS_10: We cannot ship items that are restricted or prohibited by law in Myanmar or the origin country. This includes but is not limited to weapons, illegal drugs, hazardous materials, and counterfeit goods. Please check our Terms & Conditions page for a complete list of restricted items.
FAQ.ANS_11: Yes, we handle all customs documentation and import procedures for your packages. However, you are responsible for any import duties, taxes, or fees imposed by Myanmar customs. These charges are not included in our shipping rates and will be billed separately if applicable.
FAQ.ANS_12: Yes, we offer package consolidation services. If you have multiple packages arriving at our warehouse, we can combine them into one shipment to save on shipping costs. You can request consolidation through your account dashboard or by contacting our customer service team.
FAQ.INFO: Didn't find the answer you're looking for? Contact our support team.

TERMS.TITLE: Terms & Conditions
TERMS.INTRO: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services.
TERMS.DESC_1: Welcome to Myanmar Express hub. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing our website or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.
TERMS.DESC_2_1: "Company", "We", "Us", or "Our" refers to Myanmar Express Hub.
TERMS.DESC_2_2: "Customer", "Your", or "Yur" refers to the individual or entity using our services.
TERMS.DESC_2_3: "Services" refers to the shipping, purchasing, and logistics services provided by Myanmar Express Hub.
TERMS.DESC_2_4: "Website" refers to the Myanmar Express Hub website and any associated platforms.
TERMS.DESC_3_1: Myanmar Express hub provides international shopping and shipping services, including but not limited to:
TERMS.DESC_3_2: - Buy For Me: Purchasing products on behalf of customers from international retailers.
TERMS.DESC_3_3: - Consulting Service: Assisting customers in purchasing products from third-party sellers and marketplaces.
TERMS.DESC_3_4: - Ship for me: Providing international shipping services for packages.
TERMS.DESC_3_5: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of our services at any time without prior notice.
TERMS.DESC_4_1: To use our services, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information when creating your account and to update your information as necessary.
TERMS.DESC_4_2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if we suspect any unauthorized use or violation of these Terms and Conditions.
TERMS.DESC_5_1: All prices displayed on our website are in US Dollars unless otherwise specified. Prices are subject to change without notice.
TERMS.DESC_5_2: Payment for our services must be made in advance. We accept various payment methods as specified on our website. All payments are non-refundable unless otherwise stated in our refund policy.
TERMS.DESC_5_3: You are responsible for any import duties, taxes, or fees imposed by customs authorities. These charges are not included in our service fees and will be billed separately if applicable.
TERMS.DESC_6_1: Delivery times are estimates and not guaranteed. We are not responsible for delays caused by customs, weather conditions, or other factors beyond our control.
TERMS.DESC_6_2: We provide tracking information for all shipments. It is your responsibility to monitor the status of your shipment and to be available to receive the delivery.
TERMS.DESC_6_3: If a package is returned to us due to incorrect address information or failure to receive the delivery, you will be responsible for additional shipping charges.
TERMS.DESC_7_1: The following items are prohibited from being shipped through our services:
TERMS.DESC_7_10: - Any items prohibited by law in Myanmar or the origin country
TERMS.DESC_7_11: We reserve the right to refuse service for any item at our discretion.
TERMS.DESC_8_1: All packages shipped through our services are insured against loss or damage during transit up to a maximum value of $100 unless additional insurance is purchased.
TERMS.DESC_8_2: Claims for lost or damaged packages must be submitted within 7 days of the expected delivery date. We are not responsible for packages after they have been delivered to the specified address.
TERMS.DESC_8_3: Our liability is limited to the declared value of the package or $100, whichever is less. We are not responsible for any consequential or indirect losses.
TERMS.DESC_9: We collect and process personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using our services, you consent to the collection and processing of your personal information as described in our Privacy Policy.
TERMS.DESC_10: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Myanmar. Any disputes arising from these Terms and Conditions shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Myanmar.
TERMS.DESC_11: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of our services after any changes indicates your acceptance of the modified Terms and Conditions.
